name: Awfully Good Pizza
description:
This game was created by Shockpine and Beahives in three days for the Ludum Dare Game Jam 48!

Have you ever wanted to open a pizzeria?

Have you ever wanted to sink as deep into debt as possible?

Well have we got the game for you!

Awfully Good Pizza pays homage to the pizza-making flash games of old, and the fact that nobody actually wanted to make pizzas that looked good in them. I mean let's be honest, we've all played one and just thrown as much junk on there as possible at least once, right?

Well in Awfully Good Pizza, that's the entire aim of the game!

Your goal as the TRUE PIZZA VILLAIN is to create a pizza specifically to ruin the day of each customer who enters your shop, all in an attempt to sink deeper and deeper into debt. The more debt you're in, the better!

Featuring a total of 25 unique customers, 10 ingredients to choose from and precisely one gameplay feature, Awfully Good Pizza is "fun" for the whole family.

-------------------

Use your mouse to select menu buttons and place down ingredients*.

Press F to toggle Fullscreen.

Hold the mouse button down during the intro cutscene to skip it!

*Ingredients cannot be removed because why would anyone want to do that
